column1: '''Ephel Brandir''' (also called ''the Ephel'') was a settlement of [[Men of Brethil
column2: woodmen]] in [[Brethil]]. It lay upon the hill of [[Amon Obel]], in the forest of Brethil, and is where [[TÃºrin]] was taken when he fell ill. It was ruled by [[Brandir]] son of [[Handir]].

column1: ''Ephel Brandir'' is [[Sindarin]] for "the encircling fence of Brandir".{{fact}}
